        print(a / (a + b))
        i = i + 1

repeat = int(input())
i = 0
a = 0
prob = 0
while i < repeat:
    a = input().split()
    T_1 = int(a[0])
    T_2 = int(a[1])
    T_3 = int(a[2])
    T_4 = int(a[3])
    prob = T_1 / (T_1 + T_2)
    print(prob)
    i = i + 1
